price: Bityo, nimuhungire kwa Allah. Mu by’ukuri njye (Muhamadi) ndi umuburizi wanyu ugaragara umuturutseho.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
